info.name: Rcdevs Openotp
info.description: RCDevs OpenOTP Application enable two-factor authentication for your users. It is versatile, device-independent and based on opened security standards. OpenOTP provides fine-grained user identity and access management (IAM), one-time passwords authentication technologies (OTP) and extensive authentication policies for your AD / LDAP users. It is enterprise-ready with strong support for high-availability, load-balancing, multi-tenancy, cloud-readiness, geolocalization, delegated administration and much more.
info.author: Julien RICHARD
